message: The only bad thing i didn't like about Meteor is that you have to deploy it to a dedicated server or VPS. but it's a promising JS library and I made a complete Voting app real time in my company with Meteor.
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Real-Time Messaging for Meteor With Meteor Streams | Nettuts+
caption: net.tutsplus.com
description: This is 2013. If you are going to build a webapp, you must add real-time capabilities to the app. It is the standard. Meteor does a pretty good job at helping
